get.description:
includePhantoms: Flag to include phantom (un-'settled') events. This parameter is relevant only if TeamForge events are included.

timeout: Timeout value for Event server. This parameter is relevant only if TeamForge events are included. Values:

   negative: Use the value configured for TeamForge (default),

   0: Use framework's default value (i.e. no timeout is set),

   positive: Use the provided value (in seconds).

get.description:
This method returns the intersection of users with the specified status (all users if not specified) and the union of the users matching ids, names, search parameters (all users if not specified).
The count and offset parameters are ignored if only names and/or ids parameters are specified.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of user ids (separated by comma)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Comma separated terms to search in username, fullname fields

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Max. number of users to be returned in one call

post.summary: Uploads and sets profile picture by username
post.description:
To test in Swagger UI, do not copy the Model Schema JSON to the body. Instead, set the body to something like this: 
--4321MyBoundary
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="picture"; filename="profile.png"
Content-Type: image/png
Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64


--4321MyBoundary--
When using the API outside of Swagger, the boundary can be any value that does not also appear in the base64-encoded file content. The boundary specified in the Content-Type request header should match the boundary used in the request body. For example, if '4321MyBoundary' is used in the request body, then the header is: 
Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=4321MyBoundary

400.description: Missing picture, wrong picture Content-Type, picture too large

infos.description: Collection of all associations between two objects (such as doc versions)

associationCount.description: Total number of associations in the response

errors.description: Collection of entities representing the errors that are ignored

oldValue.description: Value of the property before this change

newValue.description: Value of the property after this change

flexField.description: Whether this property is a user-defined field

Audit Change.description: Represents a change on an object's property

changes.description: List of changes performed as part of this operation

Audit Operation.description: Represents an audit operation (collection of changes)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who performed the transaction

createdByFullname.description: Full name of the user who performed the transaction

Audit Transaction.description: Represents an audit transaction(collection of operations)

originTitle.description: Origin title (relevant only for IAF objects)

targetTitle.description: Target title (relevant only for IAF objects)

Delivery manifest.description: Represents a work item or change in Continuum

Delivery package version.description: Represents a version of a Continuum package

Delivery progression.description: Represents progression for a Continuum manifest

MonitorItems.description: Model to monitor list of Items

MonitoredObjects.description: Model for showing list of monitoring items for user

MonitoringUsers.description: Model for showing list of Users monitoring the current object

canEdit.description: When present, this flag shows whether the current user has permission to edit this object

customData.description: Map of type specific property names and values

deleted.description: Relevant for WorkItemSummary objects only. Absence of this property means it is not deleted.

phantom.description: Relevant for events only. Absence of this property means that this object is not phantom.

fieldValues.description: Possible values for dropdown config fields

PatchProjectGroup.description: Model to update a project group

alternateEmail1.description: Alternate email 1 (will be set to null if not provided).

alternateEmail2.description: Alternate email 2 (will be set to null if not provided).

alternateEmail3.description: Alternate email 3 (will be set to null if not provided).

organization.description: Organization (will be set to null if not provided).

superUser.description: The default value is false if not provided.

restrictedUser.description: The default value is false if not provided.

PatchUserGroup.description: Model to update user group data

PostAuthorizationKeys.description: Model to set authorization keys for user

PostProjectGroup.description: Model to create a project group

PostUserGroup.description: Model to create a user group

Progression Phase Info.description: Represents progression phase info for a manifest (Continuum)

ProjectApprovalRequestSummary.description: Summary of approval requests in a TF project

ServerApprovalRequestSummary.description: Summary of approval requests on TF server

hostedMode.description: Whether the server is running in hosted mode

broadcastHidable.description: Whether the broadcast message can be hidden

serverTime.description: Current server time in ISO-8601 format

serverTimezoneOffset.description: Server's timezone offset. The offset is minor variation to the standard ISO-8601 formatted string for the offset

canEditBroadcast.description: Whether current user can edit broadcast message

TypeApprovalRequestSummary.description: Summary of approval requests for  a TF object type

createdDate.description: Date this comment was created on

transactionId.description: Id of the transaction which this comment belongs to

comment.description: Model to represent a comment on a TeamForge object
